Objective: Temp 38.3Â°C; Left ear: air-filled eardrum, no inflammation; Right ear: slight redness in canal, no inflammation; Small submandibular lymph nodes, not pathological; Median uvula; Slightly red pharyngeal arch; Slightly enlarged tonsils with slough, not kissing; Lungs: vesicular breath sounds, no additional sounds; Saturation 98%.

Plan: 1. No antibiotics, as symptoms suggest viral etiology. 2. Pain management: Paracetamol up to 4x/day, ibuprofen 400mg up to 3x/day if needed. 3. Drink plenty of fluids, cold drinks/popsicles for pain relief. 4. Safety net: Contact if worsening symptoms, shortness of breath, or difficulty swallowing. 5.
